sect2.title: Introduction to kdebase
sect2.para: kdebase is the second mandatory package (besides kdelibs) for the K Desktop Environment. It provides various applications and infrastructure files and libraries.

sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: Major programs in kdebase include kdesktop, kaddressbook, kappfinder, kcontrol, kdeprint, kdm, kfind, khelpcenter, khotkeys, kicker, klipper, kmenuedit, konqueror, konsole, kscreensaver and ktip.

sect3.title: kdesktop
sect3.para: kdesktop is the program that handles desktop icons, popup menus, and the screensaver system.

sect3.title: kappfinder
sect3.para: kappfinderis an utility to add non-KDE applications to K-menu.

sect3.title: kdm
sect3.para: kdm is the KDE Display manager (a replacement for xdm.

sect3.title: kfind
sect3.para: kfind is an utility to find files.

sect3.title: khelpcenter
sect3.para: khelpcenter is the KDE help tool.

sect3.title: khotkeys
sect3.para: khotkeys handles hot keys for KDE.

sect3.title: kicker
sect3.para: kicker is the KDE control panel.

sect3.title: kmenuedit
sect3.para: kmenuedit is an utility to rearrange or add items to the K-menu.

sect3.title: konqueror
sect3.para: konqueror is a filesystem and Web browser.

sect3.title: konsole
sect3.para: konsole is a highly configurable X terminal emulator.

sect3.title: kscreensaver
sect3.para: kscreensaver is a program to set up screensavers.

sect3.title: ktip
sect3.para: ktip is a wizard to provide hints and KDE information.
